title: Randuins needs to be applied to Gankplank's barrels.
body: There's no reason that {{item:3143}} shouldn't be applied to a skill that, not only ignores defense, but is an area damage that can also produce critical hits. Those barrels might as well be true damage the way they are set up and there's no way to counter them what so ever other than a lucky shot to hit it first. That crit reduction needs to be applied to his barrels as well when he's multi hitting 4 people for 1k+ each with 1 skill.

replies.body: If his barrels could crit then I would see an argument for this.
I am so confused by both this post and the op

I just took at guess at what OP was saying and somehow thinks that barrels crit.

Last I checked his barrels could not crit.

I main GP
Yes they do lol
Have you never seen him crit for 1k on a squishy lategame

It does work on barrels though, just not the bonus damage to champions only that barrels have
The rest of the damage on the barrel coming from Q/AAs does get reduced though
Well that would explain the huge inconsistency of their damage output.
Is it so hard to say "my mistake?"
Rule number one of an argument. Never admit you're wrong. Only admit your opponent was right.
"I may not be right, but I am never wrong"
I do that at others times.

Oh, my bad then.
Ignore what I said.

That's an interesting name for a GP main lol
Not saying that you're lying, just genuinely interesting
They can crit though. You just have to crit on your AA/Q that triggers them.
uhm I wonder if the barrels should be allowed to crit altogether... they already ignore defenses, that's true damage
They ignore 40% armor. That is Armor Penetration.
ooooh Only 40% I thought it was like 100% :S my bad
Still though, ignoring 40% + and additional 35% from {{item:3035}} is 75% armor ignored

Wrong math

40% of total armor
35% of bonus armor

for example champion with 100 armor without any armor item 

100- [ (100*40%)- (0*35%)]
100- [40+0]
60

100 armor  will reduce to 60 armor 


for example champion with 100 armor AND 50 of armor item 

150- [ (150 X 40%)- (50 X 35%)]
150- [60+17.5]
150-77.5
72.5

150 armor  will reduce to 72.5 armor



GP's barrel is so strong...  therefore need to nerf to 15/20/25/30/35... but riot doesn't want... blame riot and testers.



source:
- Poweder Keg explodes dealing the attack's damage as physical damage (ignores 40% Armor) to enemies
- Last Whisper: +35% **bonus **armor penetration.

> - Last Whisper: +35% **bonus **armor penetration.


Literally the only reason to play GP is because of his damage. His early is shit to the extent that it requires specialized builds to function in high elo where you encounter decent junglers. League also NEEDS tank busters. Nerfing his barrel pen is just going make GP unplayable.
Literally the only reason you play most champions isbecause of their damage lol.

I'm pretty sure she's trying to say that Gangplank doesn't really provide anything other than damage.
He has no hard CC, no team utility etc.

he has a global ult that slows............ and can clear waves from the other side of the map
sry bro, that's team utility along side with his damage

gankplank provides: safe wave clear - important if your mid laner is an assassin
global pressure
zone control
and cc slow

along side with his damage. you got no clue how much i hate that his ult slows >.>
and it has nowhere near the cooldown of a Khartus or shen ult for example. Because building CDR is normal for him.
Shen or Karthus usually go for a no CDR item in their first 2 items.
Such as Tear+RoA. Or Sunfire+Titanic Hydra.
The only CDR item shen gets its his Spirit visage and that's it. And the only CDR item Khartus usually gets its zhonias.

GP starts with a 20cdr item and then rushes a 10cdr item after it.
Like sry, but, GP provides more than just damage.

That being said, I don't know what they can nerf anymore without making him unplayable.

I'm just saying that Theorchero probably tried to say that.

I'm not gonna bother argueing here with you. 
People here don't want reasonable arguments, or have an actual discussion. 
People just want to please their hateboner and whine for a bit. Which is fine, but trying to have a discussion in a thread where most people do not want to have an actual discussion is just a waste of my time.

if your argument is that "GP provides only damage", that argument is false from the beginning
you can't make a reasonable argument regarding that. GP is not Mastery YI
I'm not making an argument at all.
I thought my reading comprehension was shit then I saw him *twice* assume you were agreeing with Theorchero.

your poor head :3

It's okay fam. <3

Tanks, supports, utility mages

Really though, many champions are chosen for how they apply their damage.  Ranged vs melee, dps vs burst, flat vs %, phys vs magic vs true, etc.

I'm pretty sure randuins does reduce barrel damage.

Also, the barrels only ignore 40% armor on their own, if they're ignoring more then it's probably because the gp itemized penetration and/or is running penetration in his runes.

GP isn't even anywhere near broken, why should he be nerfed?

> [{quoted}](name=SquashCannon,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jc7OFvLa,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2017-05-13T22:13:49.479+0000)
>
> I'm pretty sure randuins does reduce barrel damage.
> 
> Also, the barrels only ignore 40% armor on their own, if they're ignoring more then it's probably because the gp itemized penetration and/or is running penetration in his runes.
> 
> GP isn't even anywhere near broken, why should he be nerfed?

New Randuins doesn't.  It only applies to basic attack crits.  They specifically nerfed that aspect of Randuins for some stupid reason.  It doesn't work on Anivia E anymore, either.
Well as far as I'm concerned, it really shouldn't work on Anivia's E as the spell says it deals double damage, not that it crits.
That's.... that's what a crit is.....
If all of a is b, is all of b a?  That's the situation.  A crit is double damage (not counting IE/runes), but double damage is not necessarily a crit.
So what you're saying is that {{item:3057}} is a crit?
No, because sheen is ONLY base damage.

Double damage =/= crit.

Double damage SOUNDS the same as crit, but what about effects like +50% damage or +300% damage or even perhaps double base damage?

Is Warwick's passive Criticallly Striking when he's below 20% health? No, it simply deals tripled damage. Same goes for Anivia's E. It is dealing doubled damage, NOT critically striking. The only reason it is read as a crit is because that's how it was coded so the little "!" would show up by the damage numbers.
Doesn't Randuins reduce anything that uses the Crit symbol? I know it reduces Ryze and Karthus crits, and I assumed it did the same for GP.
Old one did new one only works on basic attacks
If they don't, I'm pretty sure that's a bug.
It says in the description "reduces crits from BASIC ATTACKS". New change.
[It interacts with all critical damage,](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/QesmyUJj-meddler-randuins-omen-reduces-anivias-damage?comment=00060001&show=flat)

THAT WAS 2 YEARS AGO IT JUST GOT CHANGED IN THE TANK UPDATE. Look at it in game instead of spewing 2 year old "facts" that no longer are true. It says IN GAME "reduces critical damage from BASIC ATTACKS by 20%"

You see, we as a community stopped trusting things like "in-game descriptions" a long time ago.

The patch notes only address it as "critical strike". There has been no indication by riot that they changed its interactions with spells.
